term-referencing.title: Term referencing test
term-referencing.description: Test checking if each term is linked to a module through a rdfs:isDefineBy property

Pass.title: Any term is referenced
Pass.description: Each term of the test subject is linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject syntax must be correct

CannotTell.title: Term not referenced to a module
CannotTell.description: A term of the fragment is not linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

MajorFail.title: Term not referenced to a module
MajorFail.description: A term of the fragment is not linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

MinorFail.title: Term not referenced to a module
MinorFail.description: A term of the fragment is not linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

domain-and-range-referencing.title: Domain or range out of vocabulary
domain-and-range-referencing.description: Test checking if each range of domain of any property is defined within the fragment

Pass.title: Domains properly defined
Pass.description: Each rdfs:domain is defined within the fragment

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The syntax of the subject and any of its imports must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Domain out of vocabulary
CannotTell.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:domain defined out of the vocabulary

MajorFail.title: Domain out of vocabulary
MajorFail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:domain defined out of the vocabulary

MinorFail.title: Domain out of vocabulary
MinorFail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:domain defined out of the vocabulary

Pass.title: Ranges properly defined
Pass.description: Each rdfs:range is defined within the fragment

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The syntax of the subject and any of its imports must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Range out of vocabulary
CannotTell.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:range defined out of the vocabulary

MajorFail.title: Range out of vocabulary
MajorFail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:range defined out of the vocabulary

MinorFail.title: Range out of vocabulary
MinorFail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:range defined out of the vocabulary

terms-differenciation.title: Test of terms differenciation
terms-differenciation.description: Test checking if each term of the subject have a Levenshtein distance high enough from each other

Pass.title: Terms differenciated enough
Pass.description: All the terms have have a satisfying Levenshtein distance from each other term.

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject needs to be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Too close terms
CannotTell.description: Two terms defined in the fragment have a Levenshtein distance too low

MajorFail.title: Too close terms
MajorFail.description: Two terms defined in the fragment have a Levenshtein distance too low

MinorFail.title: Too close terms
MinorFail.description: Two terms defined in the fragment have a Levenshtein distance too low

syntax.title: Syntax test
syntax.description: A test meant to check wether the test subject is syntaxically correct or not.

Pass.title: Correct syntax
Pass.description: Test subject has a correct syntax

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The file needs to be found

owl-rl-constraint.title: OWL RL Constraint violation test
owl-rl-constraint.description: A test meant to check if a OWL RL constraint is violated

Pass.title: OWL RL consistent
Pass.description: The provided graph is consistent for any OWL RL constraint

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject and its recursive imports must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: OWL RL Constraint violation
CannotTell.description: The fragment violates at least one OWL RL constraint

MajorFail.title: OWL RL Constraint violation
MajorFail.description: The fragment violates at least one OWL RL constraint

MinorFail.title: OWL RL Constraint violation
MinorFail.description: The fragment violates at least one OWL RL constraint

labeled-terms.title: Term labeling test
labeled-terms.description: Test checking if all the terms defined in the subject have at least a rdfs:label pointing to a literal in English

Pass.title: All terms labeled
Pass.description: All the terms defined in the subject have a rdfs:label in English

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject and its recursive imports must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Terms not labeled
CannotTell.description: Some terms do not have a rdfs:label property pointing to a literal written in English

MajorFail.title: Terms not labeled
MajorFail.description: Some terms do not have a rdfs:label property pointing to a literal written in English

MinorFail.title: Terms not labeled
MinorFail.description: Some terms do not have a rdfs:label property pointing to a literal written in English

profile-compatibility.title: OWL Profile Compatibility Test
profile-compatibility.description: Test for the compatibility of the subject for the OWL Profile

Pass.title: OWL RL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL RL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: OWL RL Profile incompatible
CannotTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL RL sublanguage

MajorFail.title: OWL RL Profile incompatible
MajorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL RL sublanguage

MinorFail.title: OWL RL Profile incompatible
MinorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL RL sublanguage

Pass.title: OWL QL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL QL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: OWL QL Profile incompatible
CannotTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL QL sublanguage

MajorFail.title: OWL QL Profile incompatible
MajorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL QL sublanguage

MinorFail.title: OWL QL Profile incompatible
MinorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL QL sublanguage

Pass.title: OWL EL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL EL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: OWL EL Profile incompatible
CannotTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL EL sublanguage

MajorFail.title: OWL EL Profile incompatible
MajorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL EL sublanguage

MinorFail.title: OWL EL Profile incompatible
MinorFail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL EL sublanguage

term-recognition.title: Test of ontology term existence
term-recognition.description: Test checking if each term of the ontology used in the subject indeed exist in the ontology

Pass.title: Every term exists
Pass.description: All the ontologic terms in the subject are defined in the ontology

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Unknown ontology term
CannotTell.description: A term of the subject is not defined in the ontology

MajorFail.title: Unknown ontology term
MajorFail.description: A term of the subject is not defined in the ontology

MinorFail.title: Unknown ontology term
MinorFail.description: A term of the subject is not defined in the ontology

prefix-validity.title: Term validity test
prefix-validity.description: A test case checking if all the prefixes are not too close from the most used existing namespaces (according to prefix cc)

Pass.title: No prefix typo
Pass.description: It seems that none of the subject URIs have prefixes typos

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Possible prefix typo
CannotTell.description: A URI of the subject seems to be a typo of a very common prefix

MajorFail.title: Possible prefix typo
MajorFail.description: A URI of the subject seems to be a typo of a very common prefix

MinorFail.title: Possible prefix typo
MinorFail.description: A URI of the subject seems to be a typo of a very common prefix

query-type.title: Query type test
query-type.description: A test meant to check if the query is indeed of type Select or Ask

Pass.title: Accurate query type
Pass.description: The query is of type Select or Ask

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The query must be syntaxically correct

CannotTell.title: Unauthorized query type
CannotTell.description: The query is not of type Select or Ask

MinorFail.title: Unauthorized query type
MinorFail.description: The query is not of type Select or Ask

MajorFail.title: Unauthorized query type
MajorFail.description: The query is not of type Select or Ask

uri-validity.title: URI Validity test
uri-validity.description: A test meant to check if all the URIs of th resource are well-formed

Pass.title: All subject URI valid
Pass.description: All the URIs of the subject are valid

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically valid

CannotTell.title: Invalid URI
CannotTell.description: Some URIs of the subject are not valid URIs

MinorFail.title: Invalid URI
MinorFail.description: Some URIs of the subject are not valid URIs

MajorFail.title: Invalid URI
MajorFail.description: Some URIs of the subject are not valid URIs
